com.github.pwittchen.infinitescroll.library

Class InfiniteScrollListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • RecyclerView.OnScrollListener
      • com.github.pwittchen.infinitescroll.library.InfiniteScrollListener

  • public abstract class InfiniteScrollListener
extends RecyclerView.OnScrollListener
    InfiniteScrollListener, which can be added to RecyclerView with addOnScrollListener to detect moment when RecyclerView was scrolled to the end.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      InfiniteScrollListener(int maxItemsPerRequest, LinearLayoutManager layoutManager)
      Initializes InfiniteScrollListener, which can be added to RecyclerView with addOnScrollListener method

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods

      protected boolean canLoadMoreItems()
      Checks if more items can be loaded to the RecyclerView
      void onScrolled(RecyclerView recyclerView, int dx, int dy)
      Callback method to be invoked when the RecyclerView has been scrolled
      abstract void onScrolledToEnd(int firstVisibleItemPosition)
      Callback method to be invoked when the RecyclerView has been scrolled to the end
      protected void refreshView(RecyclerView view, RecyclerView.Adapter adapter, int position)
      Refreshes RecyclerView by setting new adapter, calling invalidate method and scrolling to given position

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • InfiniteScrollListener

        public InfiniteScrollListener(int maxItemsPerRequest,
                              LinearLayoutManager layoutManager)
        Initializes InfiniteScrollListener, which can be added to RecyclerView with addOnScrollListener method
        Parameters:
        maxItemsPerRequest - Max items to be loaded in a single request.
        layoutManager - LinearLayoutManager created in the Activity.

    • Method Detail

      • onScrolled

        public void onScrolled(RecyclerView recyclerView,
                       int dx,
                       int dy)
        Callback method to be invoked when the RecyclerView has been scrolled
        Parameters:
        recyclerView - The RecyclerView which scrolled.
        dx - The amount of horizontal scroll.
        dy - The amount of vertical scroll.

      • refreshView

        protected void refreshView(RecyclerView view,
                           RecyclerView.Adapter adapter,
                           int position)
        Refreshes RecyclerView by setting new adapter, calling invalidate method and scrolling to given position
        Parameters:
        view - RecyclerView to be refreshed
        adapter - adapter with new list of items to be loaded
        position - position to which RecyclerView will be scrolled

      • canLoadMoreItems

        protected boolean canLoadMoreItems()
        Checks if more items can be loaded to the RecyclerView
        Returns:
        boolean Returns true if can load more items or false if not.

      • onScrolledToEnd

        public abstract void onScrolledToEnd(int firstVisibleItemPosition)
        Callback method to be invoked when the RecyclerView has been scrolled to the end
        Parameters:
        firstVisibleItemPosition - Id of the first visible item on the list.
